title: UnitGo ‚Äì Smart Unit Converter
description:
UnitGo is a fast, smart, and offline-friendly unit & currency converter designed to save time and effort.

Instead of selecting menus and dropdowns, just type what you want to convert and get instant results.

Examples:
‚Ä¢ 10 km to miles
‚Ä¢ 100 usd to inr
‚Ä¢ 5 kg to lb
‚Ä¢ 32 f to c

UnitGo understands your input and converts it instantly.

üöÄ WHY UNITGO?

‚úî Smart typing
Type conversions naturally, like you think. No complicated steps.

‚úî All-in-one converter
Convert length, weight, temperature, area, volume, speed, time, data, cooking units, and currency in one app.

‚úî Live currency rates (offline-friendly)
Currency rates are updated automatically and cached, so conversions work even without internet.

‚úî Favorites for quick access
Save your most-used conversions and convert with one tap.

‚úî History you can reuse
All your recent conversions are saved. Tap any entry to repeat instantly.

‚úî Clean & fast UI
Designed for speed, clarity, and daily use. No clutter, no confusion.

üìê SUPPORTED CONVERSIONS

‚Ä¢ Length ‚Äì km, m, cm, mm, mile, ft, inch  
‚Ä¢ Weight ‚Äì kg, g, lb, oz, ton  
‚Ä¢ Temperature ‚Äì ¬∞C, ¬∞F, K  
‚Ä¢ Area & Volume  
‚Ä¢ Speed & Time  
‚Ä¢ Data ‚Äì KB, MB, GB, TB  
‚Ä¢ Cooking units ‚Äì tsp, tbsp, cup, ml, g  
‚Ä¢ Currency ‚Äì USD, INR, EUR, GBP, JPY & more  

üîí PRIVACY FIRST
All conversions happen on your device.
No personal data is collected or shared.

‚ö° WHO IS UNITGO FOR?

‚Ä¢ Students  
‚Ä¢ Engineers  
‚Ä¢ Travelers  
‚Ä¢ Cooks  
‚Ä¢ Traders  
‚Ä¢ Anyone who needs quick conversions  

üéØ Just type. Convert. Done.
Download UnitGo and make unit conversion effortless.
